Neither <WG3761>, because <WG3754> they are <WG1526> the seed <WG4690> of Abraham <WG11>, are they all <WG3956> children <WG5043>: but <WG235>, In <WG1722> Isaac <WG2464> shall <WG2564> thy <WG4671> seed <WG4690> be called <WG2564>.

For <WG1063> this <WG3778> is the word <WG3056> of promise <WG1860>, At <WG2596> this <WG5126> time <WG2540> will I come <WG2064>, and <WG2532> Sarah <WG4564> shall have <WG2071> a son <WG5207>.

And <WG1161> not <WG3756> only <WG3440> this; but <WG235> when Rebecca <WG4479> also <WG2532> had conceived <WG2845> by <WG1537> one <WG1520> <WG2192>, even by our <WG2257> father <WG3962> Isaac <WG2464>;

(For <WG1063> the children being <WG1080> not yet <WG3380> born <WG1080>, neither <WG3366> having done <WG4238> any <WG5100> good <WG18> or <WG2228> evil <WG2556>, that <WG2443> the purpose <WG4286> of God <WG2316> according <WG2596> to election <WG1589> might stand <WG3306>, not <WG3756> of <WG1537> works <WG2041>, but <WG235> of <WG1537> him that calleth <WG2564>;)

For <WG1063> he saith <WG3004> to Moses <WG3475>, I will have mercy on <WG1653> whom <WG3739> <WG302> I will have mercy <WG1653>, and <WG2532> I will have compassion <WG3627> on whom <WG3739> <WG302> I will have compassion <WG3627>.

Thou wilt say <WG2046> then <WG3767> unto me <WG3427>, Why <WG5101> doth he yet <WG2089> find fault <WG3201>? For <WG1063> who <WG5101> hath resisted <WG436> his <WG846> will <WG1013>?

Nay but <WG3304>, O <WG5599> man <WG444>, who <WG5101> art <WG1488> thou <WG4771> that repliest against <WG470> God <WG2316>? <WG3361> Shall <WG2046> the thing formed <WG4110> say <WG2046> to him that formed <WG4111> it, Why <WG5101> hast thou made <WG4160> me <WG3165> thus <WG3779>? repliest: or, answerest again, or, disputest with God?
